When creating a filter using the `contract.filters`, this is returned.

## Properties

| Property | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `fragment` | [`EventFragment`](/cn/sdk/content/classes/EventFragment) | The fragment of the event. |

## Methods

### getTopicFilter()

```ts
getTopicFilter(): Promise<TopicFilter>
```

Get the topic filter.

#### Returns

`Promise`\<[`TopicFilter`](/cn/sdk/content/type-aliases/TopicFilter)\>

A promise resolving to the topic filter.
